entities.name: Triwizard Cup
entities.description: The Triwizard Cup is described as the glory of their school and a thousand Galleons personal prize money.

entities.name: Fred Weasley
entities.description: Fred Weasley is mentioned as someone who is enthusiastic about winning the Triwizard Cup.

entities.name: Hogwarts
entities.description: Hogwarts is described as the school that the Triwizard Cup will be brought to.

entities.name: Dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as someone who is speaking to the students about the rules of the Triwizard Tournament.

entities.name: Ministry of Magic
entities.description: The Ministry of Magic is mentioned as one of the organizations that has agreed to impose an age restriction on contenders this year.

relationships.description: Fred Weasley wants to win the Triwizard Cup.
Dumbledore is connected to Hogwarts as its headmaster.
The Ministry of Magic has agreed to impose an age restriction on contenders this year for the Triwizard Tournament.
